plugins.name: Copy Paste Styled Text
plugins.description:
Copying text into Figma shouldn’t mean losing your formatting.


🌎 Problem We Solve —

When you directly copy and paste text from the web into Figma, it usually loses its structure—everything gets flattened into a single, unformatted block of text.


🚀 Our Solution —

With this plugin, your text stays formatted exactly as it should—headings, bullet points, code styling, you name it—it all remains intact. No more reformatting by hand. Our plugin seamlessly handles styles for:

  1. headings
  2. subheadings
  3. bullet points & lists
  4. code snippets
  5. font weights
  6. bold & italics


🌱 Get the most out of this plugin with ChatGPT —

This also works seamlessly with text documents generated in ChatGPT, Claude, DeepSeek, Gemini, Mistral, Llama, or your favorite LLM of choice.

Whether you're drafting a quick project scope outline or developer handoff notes, simply copy and paste it from your LLM into Figma using this plugin, and your structured document will remain perfectly intact—ready to use without extra formatting effort.


P.S. If you found this plugin useful, check out more of our free resources on our Bento. For updates on new releases, follow @redwood.ux on Instagram!


🍊 Find us online!

  1. Instagram: @redwood.ux
  2. Website: redwoodux.com
  3. Kofi: ko-fi.com/redwoodux
  4. Bento: bento.me/redwoodux
plugins.tagline: Preserve your text formatting when you copy-paste text from the web into Figma

plugins.name: File Structure Generator
plugins.description:
Generate a a generic file structure for your next project which is designed to help you set up your Figma project quickly and efficiently. This plugin creates a set of default pages with predefined names such as "For approval", "Prototype", "Visual Designs", "Wireframes", "Research", and "Archive", and a cover page.


You no longer have to spend time manually creating pages and artboards, or setting up a cover page for your project.

By using this plugin, you can save time and focus on the creative aspects of your project. It provides you with a consistent starting point, ensuring that your Figma files are structured in a standardized way that makes it easy for you to manage your designs and collaborate with your team.

accepted.name: Mukul Chaturvedi
accepted.description: I am a Self-taught designer passionately in love with anything and everything related to designing.

plugins.tagline: Generates File Structure for your Next Figma Project

plugins.name: Fig Tool
plugins.description:
Fig Tool – All-in-One Figma Design Assistant with Flip UI to RTL feature: https://sites.google.com/view/fig-tool/home

A comprehensive plugin to speed up your Figma workflow with smart selection, editing, color control, and RTL support. With LANGUAGE TRANSLATION


Overview

Fig Tool is built to supercharge your design process with a collection of powerful utilities, all within a responsive and intuitive interface. Whether you're managing components, flipping layouts for RTL languages, or batch-editing styles, Fig Tool adapts to your workflow with horizontal and vertical layout modes.


🔑 Key Features

Smart Selection

All Text: Select every text layer in a frame


By Alignment: Filter text layers by left, center, or right alignment


All Components: Select all component instances, including nested ones


First Layer Components: Focus on top-level component instances


Flip In Place: Horizontally flip elements without moving them


Reverse Align: Switch text alignment direction


Component Breaking

Detach Components: Break components for editing flexibility


Options: Selected only, All, First Layer


Ungroup Objects: Break apart group structures


Unframe Elements: Flatten frames for direct editing


Color Control

Adjust hue, saturation, and lightness (HSB sliders)


Target fills, strokes, effects, or all at once


Apply changes to multiple elements with one click


Lorem Ipsum Generator

Insert placeholder text with start customization


Add/remove word count


Smart fill to match text box dimensions


Copy/Paste Styles

Copy from a source element


Paste to multiple targets


Choose specific properties:


Effects, Fills, Strokes


Corners, Layout, Opacity, Blend Modes


Prefix/Suffix Name Manager

Add or remove prefixes and suffixes in bulk


Clean up layer naming for consistent organization


🌐 Flip UI – RTL Support

Convert left-to-right (LTR) layouts to right-to-left (RTL) for languages like Arabic or Hebrew:


Detaches all components for accurate mirroring


Flips layout horizontally


Adjusts text alignment (left ↔ right)


Handles images and containers intelligently


⚠️ Important: This feature detaches components. Use a duplicate frame to preserve your original design.


📦 Fig Box – Visual Element Library

A personal design library for frequently used elements:


Add to Fig Box: Save selected elements


Insert or Replace: Drop items into current designs or replace existing ones


Search & Organize: Quickly find stored elements


Stored locally – private to your device and persistent across sessions


🖥️ Dual Interface Modes

Choose a layout that fits your screen and workflow:


Horizontal Mode: Toolbar across the top for quick access


Vertical Mode: Compact sidebar for focused editing

Switch easily using the ⇄ layout switcher. Expand or shrink the panel using the ⇔ toggle.


💡 Tips for Efficient Use

Use selection filters before applying edits for better precision


Flip designs for RTL only on duplicated frames


Organize Fig Box items with meaningful names for faster reuse


Combine name management with selection tools to apply naming systems quickly


❓ Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Q: Do both layout modes offer the same features?

Yes, both modes offer full access. Choose based on your screen size or personal preference.


Q: Will detaching components affect my master library?

No, it only affects instances in your selection. Original components remain untouched.


Q: Can I apply color changes to multiple items at once?

Absolutely. Just select all relevant elements and apply your HSB edits.


Q: Does Fig Box store my elements online?

No, all Fig Box items are stored locally in your browser, keeping your designs private and fast.


Q: How does the plugin generate Lorem Ipsum text?

It calculates based on your text box's size and font properties to fit naturally within the design.


🔔 What’s New in This Major Release

🚀 Fig Tool 2.0 – More than just RTL!


Previously known as "Flip UI – Make It RTL", the plugin now includes 20+ features to boost productivity


Renamed to "Fig Tool" to reflect its wider utility beyond RTL support


Smart selection, color manipulation, Fig Box, and batch operations added


📞 Contact & Support

For questions, feature suggestions, or bug reports, reach out via the Figma Community.


Fig Tool — Design faster, smarter, and with more control.

All the tools you need. In one place.
plugins.tagline: Fig Tool - All-in-One Figma Design Assistant with One Click Flip UI - RTL Feature

plugins.name: Gridly
plugins.description:
Gridly makes content management and localization a continuous and streamlined process. By centralizing content in one place, Gridly ensures updates are synchronized seamlessly across languages and projects.


Manage content like a spreadsheet

With Gridly’s user-friendly, spreadsheet-like interface, you can manage content in multiple languages, enrich translations with additional data, or run automated actions such as machine translation or generative AI.


Localize Figma designs in minutes

Bridge the gap between your design process and localization workflows with Gridly for Figma. Push text in selected layers and their screenshots to Gridly. Group duplicated texts and pull back updated translations or proofread text to your Figma project, allowing you to check if your design works in other languages. 


Build agile localization workflow

Keep the text in your designs up-to-date across all your languages with real-time change tracking in Gridly. Leverage built-in QA and translation tools, and effortlessly deploy localized content to your build pipeline.


Connect your Figma designs to Gridly’s content management and localization platform using the Figma plugin. Enabling you to:


  • Instantly push text from selected layers in Figma to Gridly
  • Generate screenshots of synced objects and store them in Gridly
  • Group duplicated source texts to save time on translation
  • Pull back updated text and translations from Gridly
  • View localized Figma designs in multiple languages
  • Centralize text content from multiple Figma designs in one place


Sign up for Gridly today, download the Figma plugin, and experience the power of a streamlined localization workflow.


Get started now:

  • Sign up to Gridly here
  • Learn more about how a localization workflow works
  • Read more about how the plugin works here
plugins.tagline: Localize Figma designs in minutes: sync, view, and manage multilingual content using Gridly.

plugins.name: Bloom
plugins.description:
Bloom

This little figma plugin helps you to create parameterized flower / star vector shape with ease.

You can explore combinations of parameters to create your own favorite shapes.


Create:

  1. Drag or click the controls to change the shape, preview in realtime on the left side.
  2. Hit "Create" button to add it on the page.


View bezier curve control points of vector shape:

Turn on the 'Show Bezier Controls' switch.


Update:

  1. Select the vector shape created by this plugin.
  2. Change parameters using controls.
  3. The 'Create' button will change to 'Update', just click it.
plugins.tagline: Create, edit dynamic flower vector shape with parameters

plugins.name: AI Icon Finder
plugins.description:
AI Icon Finder is a powerful Figma plugin that helps designers quickly find the perfect icons using natural language. Simply describe what you're looking for, and our AI will interpret your query and locate the most relevant icons instantly.


How It Works


  1. Type a description of the icon you need (e.g., "payment confirmation" or "shopping cart with items")
  2. Click "Search" and watch as AI interprets your query into relevant keywords
  3. AI Interpreted queries are clickable and using as a search element for better linking over results
  4. Browse the results and preview icons before inserting
  5. Insert directly into your design or copy the SVG with one click
plugins.tagline: AI-powered icon search that understands even the most abstract prompts.

plugins.name: Volcano for Figma
plugins.description:
什么是火山引擎-国际化翻译平台


火山引擎旗下的国际化翻译平台为用户提供高效专业的【平台+服务】解决方案，简化本地化管理流程，提高多语言内容管理效率，助力产品国际化转型。


前往国际化翻译平台


什么是 Volcano for Figma


Volcano for Figma 是一个连接国际化翻译平台和 Figma 的文案推送和 UI本地化插件。体验或内容设计师可将 Figma 中的文本作为源文案推送至翻译平台，支持按需定义 Key、上传截图等；同时，插件可通过机器翻译或翻译平台的译文快速将设计稿显示为不同语言的界面，帮助检查多语言效果，节省设计师、产品经理、译员和开发人员之间的沟通成本，帮助团队快速交付多语言产品。


这个插件可以：


  1. Figma → 翻译平台：扫描并推送 Figma 文本至平台，并上传截图；
  2. UI 本地化：将 Figma 设计稿显示为其他语言界面，检查多语言界面效果；


阅读使用指南，了解详细操作详见 用户手册


-------------------------


What is Volcengine Internationalization platform?


Volcengine Internationalization platform under Volcano Engine provides users with efficient and professional [Platform + Service] solutions, simplifies the Localization management process, improves the efficiency of multilingual content management, and helps product Internationalization transformation.


Go Internationalization platform


What is Volcano for Figma?


Volcano for Figma, a Figma plugin that enables UI localization, and push strings and screenshots between the Internationalization platform and Figma. Experience or content designers can push Figma text as source string to the Internationalization platform, support Key definition, upload screenshots, etc. At the same time, the plugin can quickly display the design draft as an interface in different languages through machine translation (MT) or platform's translation, helps check multilingual effects, saves communication costs between designers, product managers, translators and developers, which helps teams deliver multilingual products efficiently.


This plugin allows you to:

  1. Scan and push Figma text to the internationalization platform, and upload screenshots;
  2. UI localization: Display the Figma design as an interface in other languages, and check the effect of the multilingual interface;


Check User documentation for more information
plugins.tagline: content, i18n, internationalization, i10n, localization, language, translation, translate, ux

plugins.name: Tooltipo
plugins.description:
Create beautifully designed tooltips in seconds with Tooltip Generator! This plugin streamlines your workflow by offering real-time preview and comprehensive customization options. Perfect for UI designers, design system maintainers, and anyone looking to add consistent tooltips to their designs.


Detailed Features

• Live Preview: See your tooltip changes in real-time as you customize

• Multiple Positions: Choose from top, right, bottom, or left positioning

• Full Customization: Control colors, padding, font size, corner radius, and pointer size

• Color Control: Use color picker or input hex codes directly

• Auto-Layout Ready: All tooltips are created with auto-layout for easy integration

• Clean Output: Organized layers with proper naming and structure

• Dark Theme UI: Comfortable interface that matches Figma's dark theme

• Single-Click Creation: Generate your tooltip instantly with one click


How to Use

1. Set your tooltip text

2. Customize colors using the color picker or hex inputs

3. Choose the pointer position (top, right, bottom, or left)

4. Adjust size settings if needed (padding, font size, corner radius, pointer)

5. Preview your changes in real-time

6. Click "Create Tooltip" to add it to your design
plugins.tagline: A simple way to generate auto-layout tooltips with custom styling and positioning

Looking for a plugin that can help you generate round tunnels?


Introducing Wormhole Tunnels!


How it works:

  1. Open the Wormhole Tunnels plugin.
  2. Play with these parameters:
  3. Twist/Spiral (Range: 0-360)
  4. Contraction/Expansion (Range: 0-100)
  5. Radial Lines (Range: 5-50)

plugins.name: Text Repeat Grid
plugins.description:
Introducing the "Text Repeat Grid" Plugin for Figma


This plug-in was primarily created to make working with tables and repeating elements / grid layouts with text a lot easier and faster. However you can use it for many other things as well, like e.g. copying text from a group to a component (using the “Get Text From Selection” feature) and pasting it to a component or vice versa, create variations by randomizing table column data etc.


In conjunction with Figma core features, it provides a replacement for the amazing Adobe XD “Repeat Grid” feature.


Hopefully this plug-in will revolutionize the way you manage text in your designs. Here's how it can help you streamline your workflow:


Manual Input & Text File Upload

- Whether you're typing directly into the text input field or uploading a text file, this feature allows you to populate selected text frames quickly. Simply enter your text or upload a file, and each line of text will be automatically distributed to your selected text frames in the order they appear in the layers panel.

* Create realistic layouts by using text that makes sense

* Use your favourite software or AI chat bot to create content

* Each line will be filled in a separate text layer of your current selection

* e.g. user names, dates, locations, headlines, labels, tags etc.


Spreadsheet Input

Need to fill a table like-structure? The spreadsheet feature lets you drag and drop a spreadsheet file to fill text frames across multiple columns and rows simultaneously. Just remember, your text frames need to be organized in a table-like structure in Figma – think of nesting your text cells in rows or columns. Make sure you select all related columns or rows before applying the text.

You can select between a column-first and a row-first structure to fill the data according to your layer architecture.


This feature shines in scenarios like setting up a multi-field form or a dashboard where data is organized in grids. It ensures that each piece of data lands exactly where it's supposed to, across both rows and columns, saving you the hassle of manual entry.


Randomize Input

With a simple toggle, you can randomize the order of your text inputs. This is particularly useful when you want to experiment with different orders, create variations, or make the same data not look repetitive, without rearranging text manually.


Get Text from Selection

If you need to repurpose or edit text already placed in your designs, this feature makes it a breeze. Just select the text frames you want to edit, and the plugin will pull the text from each frame, allowing you to quickly make changes or redistribute the text.

* Use as copy & paste from many to many text layers

* Translation: Quickly copy text, translate in your favourite tool and paste it back


Why You'll Love It: "Text Repeat Grid" not only enhances your productivity but also integrates seamlessly into your design process, allowing you more time to focus on creativity and less on repetitive tasks.


So, ready to speed up your design process? Give "Text Repeat Grid" a try and watch your efficiency soar!
plugins.tagline: Fill any number of text layers from input, txt file or spreadsheet. Lightning fast tables, grids ...

plugins.description:
Sends the JSON of the current page to the HTTP/WebSocket endpoint of your choosing, everytime your document changes! Dead simple and nimble.

When the plugin is opened and marked "Active", the plugin will watch for any changes in the current page. If there is a change detected, it will send a HTTP/WebSocket request to your chosen endpoint. 

The plugin by itself is not useful, unless you have something that want to receive HTTP/WebSocket requests for every change in the current Figma document.

This plugin is designed for designers who need to quickly export simple animations from multiple frames in Figma. With an intuitive interface, you can import your frames, adjust the time between frames, set compression, and create instant previews — all without leaving Figma.


Ideal for creating animated banners, UI mockups, visual demos, and more. With compression support, local preview, and optimized export, you have full control over the final size and fluidity of your GIF.


Key features:


  1. Import multiple frames directly from Figma
  2. Configure delay between frames and infinite loop option
  3. Adjustable compression for quality and size control
  4. Preview directly in the plugin before exporting
  5. Local export with real-time preview


Lightweight, practical, and focused on productivity — your shortcut to creating GIFs directly from Figma.

plugins.name: Lucidi - Sync Opacity Styles
plugins.description:
Figma doesn't support maintaining layer style while changing opacity, so designers have to keep and update color styles for multiple opacities. Doing this manually can become a nightmare, so I made a plugin to automatically create, sync and update these styles.


Features


Quickly create opacity styles based of current solid color styles

  1. Enter a list of opacities you need in your color library;
  2. Write a pattern for style name (e.g. $N-alpha$A will turn into primary-alpha50 );
  3. Press "Create & sync styles".


Sync your existing colors when solid solid opaque colors change

Don't manually update values of opacity colors styles, just change your main color style and start the plugin.


Clean up unused opacity styles

Optionally rewrite and delete opacity styles that don't match your parameters.


This is a first beta launch of this plugin, feel free to reach for support anytime ✨

accepted.name: Dmytro Kondakov
accepted.description: Designing software, writing code, crafting things

plugins.tagline: Generate and sync opacity styles with local library colors

plugins.name: MP Asset Generator
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to update the styles and logos of Marriage Pact assets to reuse your design for other colleges. Aside from creating two components and changing paint styles, this plugin will not mutate your Figma file in any way.


Colors

Your file should already have color styles with a hierarchy relatively like "[Print/Digital/Text] > [Primary/Secondary]". If not, clicking any colored square should initialize them with the appropriate brand colors.


Logo

When clicking "Update Logo", the plugin looks for the group "Logos/Editable Digital Logo" on the first page and creates (or updates) the components "Digital Logo" and "Print Logo", which are scalable copies of whatever lies in Editable Digital Logo.


If your file doesn't have any such component, "Update Logo" will display an error in the plugin, and no action will be taken.


---

If you have any questions, feel free to contact jerryh2@stanford.edu.

plugins.name: Emailer Plugin. Figma to HTML email
plugins.description:
How we stand out from other similar plugins:

Emailer Plugin does not impose daily, monthly, or other limitations on core features like generating and downloading HTML emails or copying HTML code, unlike other plugins in the Figma Community.


Join our Discord server.


Features you'll love:

🔶 A huge library of 250+ design blocks and 79 email templates, with monthly updates

🔶 Download generated emails as HTML files or copy the HTML code with no limits

🔶 Preview emails in Mobile and Dark Mode

🔶 Host images on our Warm B2 Cloud Storage

🔶 Export emails to 14 major ESP platforms (ActiveCampaign, Brevo, CampaignMonitor, HubSpot, Klaviyo, MailChimp, Mandrill, Mailgun, MailJet, OneSignal, Postmark, Selzy, SendGrid, SendPulse)

🔶 Send test emails to up to 5 inboxes at once to ensure proper rendering across different email clients

🔶 Minify and optimize emails with one click to reduce HTML file size

🔶 Disable Dark Mode support in emails at any time

🔶 Embed your custom HTML code


What about email client support?

HTML emails generated by Emailer Plugin look great in:

🔶 Apple Mail (macOS, iOS, iPadOS)

🔶 Outlook (Desktop app on macOS/Windows, iOS, Android, Webmail)

🔶 Gmail (iOS, Android, Webmail)

🔶 Yahoo Mail (iOS, Android, Webmail)

🔶 Thunderbird (macOS, Windows)

🔶 Proton Mail (iOS, Android, Webmail)

🔶 And many others


What else?

Best pricing deal:

We offer the best monthly subscription price and a 30% discount on yearly subscriptions.


Blazing-fast performance:

Speed matters, and we’ve built the fastest plugin for generating HTML emails. Whether you're working with simple templates or complex, multi-section designs, Emailer Plugin renders everything instantly.


Real-time email preview rendering:

Select an email template, run the plugin, and start customizing your email’s content or design. Every change in the Figma frame is rendered in the HTML preview in real time. Want to switch to another template? Just select it on the canvas, and the plugin will instantly re-render it. No need to reload, refresh, or click any extra buttons.


Work in Figma just as you do daily:

The process of creating an email template is the same as working with any other Components or Templates library from the Figma Community.


Choose design blocks from specific Figma frames, compile them into your email template, apply your styles, and run the plugin to generate an HTML preview, download it, copy it, or export it to an ESP platform.


No hidden settings or options in the plugin:

All main actions and options are available on a single screen. We designed the UI to be straightforward, helping you speed up your work. Not slow it down.


Built-in documentation:

17 sections with short how-to videos available anytime you need them. No need to go elsewhere or interrupt your email creation process.


Google fonts support:

Use custom typography to make your emails more visually consistent, personalized, and on-brand. Fonts are applied directly from your email template in Figma to the generated HTML.


Free plan offers:

✅ Unlimited emails download

✅ Unlimited copying of the HTML code

✅ 60+ design blocks

✅ Single-column layout

✅ 9 starter templates

✅ 3 integrations to ESPs (Brevo, HubSpot, OneSignal)

✅ Send 3 test emails per day to one inbox

✅ Google fonts

✅ Basic support


PRO plan offers:

✅ Unlimited emails downloads

✅ Unlimited HTML code copying

✅ 250+ design blocks

✅ Multi-column layout

✅ 20 PRO templates with monthly updates

✅ 13 integrations with ESPs (ActiveCampaign, Brevo, CampaignMonitor, HubSpot, Klaviyo, MailChimp, Mandrill, Mailgun, MailJet, OneSignal, Postmark, Selzy, SendGrid, SendPulse)

✅ Upload images to cloud

✅ Minify HTML code

✅ Send unlimited test emails per day to up to 5 inboxes at once

✅ Embed custom HTML code

✅ Google fonts

✅ Priority support

✅ 30% discount on a yearly subscription


Need something extra?

Looking for a custom subscription plan, exclusive design blocks, or a complete email design system tailored to your brand's needs? Let us know and we’ll find a solution.


Email us at sergio@emailerplugin.io or join our Discord server.

plugins.name: WaveMaker AutoCode
plugins.description:
Convert Figma Designs that use popular UI Kits such as Material 3.0 into code. Furthermore the generated code can be easily edited in WaveMaker studio. Binding to backend APIs, customizing the pages with business logic is a cinch.


Apart from Figma design screens becoming pages in your app, the design token variables, and mode from Figma are also translated in the WaveMaker UI Kit. This powers the pixel-perfect translation of designs but also enables customization of the look and feel using the design tokens editor in WaveMaker studio.
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma Designs that use popular UI Kits such as Material 3.0 into Angular code.

Table enhancements: Added support for subtext, avatars, and pagination
Left navigation: Now adapts its height class based on whether the page content is scrollable

Breadcrumbs: Now supports two display variants
-Labels and icons
-Icons only

Segmented buttons: Now supports three display variants:
-Labels only
-Labels with icons
-Icons only

Screen size support: Improved layout rendering for wide screens

Additional CSS bug fixes for improved consistency and rendering

plugins.name: Datapaw (AI, Google Sheets, JSON, API, String, Currency, Number, Fake Data, and more)
plugins.description:
Generate realistic data exactly how you want it.

All-in-one data generation tools in a single plugin.


Datapaw helps designers populate their contents with meaningful, customizable data. Instead of using generic placeholder text like lorem ipsum, you can generate production-like data that you provide to enhances the realism of your designs.


Rich feature in every data type


📊 JSON

  1. Import content instantly via direct input or URL
  2. Add 🏞️ images and 🎨 color (HEX & RGB) to your layers
  3. Process complex nested JSON content with ease
  4. Navigate JSON data through tree view or directly to the value
  5. Control content order from random, as entered, or reverse order
  6. Lock unwanted layers for precise generation 🔒


🤖 Artificial Intelligence (AI)

  1. Instantly generate text & content for your Figma designs with AI
  2. Bring Your Own Key (BYOK), full control of your API key 🔑
  3. Supports OpenAI (others coming soon, fully pluggable architecture)
  4. Configure advanced prompts and generation settings 🎛️
  5. Add AI-generated content to text layers, components, and more


🏓 Google Sheets

  1. Import from the URL of Your Google Sheets
  2. All features in JSON can be done for this data type


🌐 API

  1. Seamlessly generate data from public or private APIs!
  2. Support for dynamic path variables, query parameters, you can now integrate API data into your workflows like never before.


📖 Multi Variable Data

  1. Generate customized data and connect it with variables 🎢
  2. Imagine a product card that uses REALISTIC data that you can easily control


💬 String, Number, Percent, Image, Data & Time, Currency

  1. Set your data EXACTLY as you want it, from min and max ranges to currency symbols, prefixes, suffixes, and others
  2. Control content order from random, as entered, or reverse order


💥 Fake Data

  1. Generate dummy data 📈 for full names, phone numbers, addresses, and more
  2. Available for English, Japanese, Indonesian, and Chinese (China) data


✄ - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -


Not only that, there is still more


🔑 Others Features

  1. Privacy First: All configurations saved locally–your data stays yours.
  2. Layer Freedom: Generate for single or multiple layers with just a few clicks.
  3. Easy Backup: Export and import your configurations between devices.


💪 Supported Data Types

  1. AI NEW
  2. JSON NEW
  3. Google Sheets NEW
  4. API NEW
  5. String (for all your text needs)
  6. Number (with flexible formatting)
  7. Percent
  8. Image
  9. Multi Variable (for complex, interconnected data)
  10. Fake Data (realistic, production-like data)
  11. Date & Time
  12. Currency
  13. …and more coming soon!


💎 Simple Pricing

Try it out with 12 free generations per Figma file, or unlock unlimited access with a one-time payment of $10.


🐞 Got ideas or found a bug?

Comment or contact me in Threads. Your feedback helps make this plugin even better for everyone!


👍 Like this? Tip me at coff.ee/afnizarnur
plugins.tagline: Generate realistic data exactly how you want it. From AI, Google Sheets, JSON, API, and more.

plugins.name: Old-school Prototyping
plugins.description:
Before Figma, we had an effective method of presenting design mockups to clients. Creating an HTML page and embedding the mockup directly at the center of the page. This method not only allowed us to showcase our designs in a clear and focused manner but also provided a straightforward way for clients to visualize the final product within a web context.


Features:


  • Retro-styled mockup presentation for a classic prototyping experience.


  • Easy replication of horizontal backgrounds with a 1px repeating background image.


  • Downloaded zip file includes a collection of mockup pages(index.html) with links to individual pages.


  • Lightweight and efficient, ensuring smooth integration into modern workflows.


  • Offers a nostalgic yet practical approach to design presentations.


  • A must-have for aficionados of vintage design aesthetics. :)


Here's how you can contribute:

A quick and easy way to show your appreciation for this plugin is by buying me a coffee. This one-time contribution fuels my passion and helps maintain the development of the plugin.


https://www.buymeacoffee.com/lucksy


Happy Prototyping!

  • A must-have for aficionados of vintage design aesthetics. :)


Here's how you can contribute:

A quick and easy way to show your appreciation for this plugin is by buying me a coffee. This one-time contribution fuels my passion and helps maintain the development of the plugin.

Happy Prototyping!

plugins.name: ColorVariable Inspector
plugins.description:
ColorVariable Inspector

allows designers and design system content creators to list all the color variables in its different variable modes (light mode, dark mode, …) and its color variable aliases for a selected layer.


It helps to better understand a complex system of nested variable aliases and variables from different variable collections.
plugins.tagline: A plugin to inspect a layer's color variable(s)

plugins.name: Share links
plugins.description:
Hot it works


1. Copy one link to the necessary file.

2. Select a frame or multiple frames, or even a section with frames.

3. Choose settings if needed and click the "Copy to clipboard" button.


Done! You get the structured list of section and frame links.
plugins.tagline: Quickly share multiple frame links with just a few clicks
